name: CardBoard Avenide
description:
cardboard avenide is a game made for mini jam 97 about a boy who plays his father in a game where he is a ball and has to get twenty coins while dodging the cars that appear often on these streets. enjoy it!

controls

space: advance the story

arrow keys: move

credits to my sister for make some sprites...I forgot to put it in the credits, sorry :(
